name: Digital Policy Roundtable
goal: The Digital Policy Roundtable (DPRT) is a group of companies from different sectors and regions that believe there is an urgent need to develop new ways of working together, both between industry players and between industry and governments, to create a better policy environment.  We believe this will be particularly crucial in the area of digital, with huge potential benefits for all who live, invest and work in the European Union.  We recognize that industry needs to think more collaboratively, more creatively and more constructively,  challenge existing thinking on policy, and build constructive partnerships with policy makers. We are not a trade association and we do not pretend to have all the answers. We want to focus on identifying the right questions and providing a unique environment for honest and frank exchanges of views and perspectives.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Digital policy, single market, competitiveness, trade, industrial policy, institutional reforms.
